description:
Secondary school Learning Support Assistants that need to have some time to work through simple ICT tasks in an informal way can use this Udemy course as a quick review or catch up session on their own or with a group in their own time and at their own pace. Course contains:

MS Word,

  • Orientation
  • Page break
  • margins,
  • headers
  • automatic date setting.
  • formatting on text
  • columns formatting
  • It also includes:

Powerpoint

  • rollovers,
  • Navigation bars
  • Simple page creation with hyperlink and images

Excel

  • Filtering an existing table
  • Pie Chart creation
  • Bar Chart Creation

All very useful for the OCR ICT qualification when students require LSA's to be up to speed with these skills. The course was designed to be taken at small regular intervals either before a lesson as a fresher or quick catch-up. Each tutorial should not take longer than a few minutes making it ideal for break time refresher material.

Software Requirements: Microsoft Word, Excel and PowerPoint.
title: Improve your ICT SKills for LSA's
